password.title: Password
password.requirements: Your password needs to be at least 8 characters long, include both lower- and upper-case characters, and have at least one number and special character

validation.minlength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
validation.pattern: Password must include lowercase, uppercase, and at least one number and special character.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Your Password?
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send a link to reset your password

messages.success: Thanks. Check your email to reset your password.

success.title: Thank You!

success.title: Registration successful

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.noCreatedProject: You haven’t created a project yet. Click the "Create New Project" button above to get started.
dashboard.watchVideoBelow: Watch the short video below or visit the OSF Get Started help guides to learn more.

latestResearch.title: Browse the latest research
latestResearch.subtitle: Check out the latest preprints hosted on OSF covering a variety of research areas

hero.title: There's a better way to manage your research
hero.subtitle: OSF is a free, open platform to support your research and enable collaboration

discover.title: Discover Public Research
discover.subtitle: Discover projects, data, materials, and collaborators on OSF that might be helpful to your own research

search.title: Search And Discover
search.description: Find papers, data, and materials to inspire your next research project. Search public projects to build on the work of others and find new collaborators

design.title: Design Your Study
design.description: Start a project and add collaborators, giving them access to protocols and other research materials. Built-in version control tracks the evolution of your study

collect.title: Collect and Analyze Data
collect.description: Store data, code, and other materials in OSF Storage, or connect your Dropbox or other third-party account. Every file gets a unique, persistent URL for citing and sharing

publish.title: Publish Your Reports
publish.description: Share papers in OSF Preprints or a community-based preprint provider, so others can find and cite your work. Track impact with metrics like downloads and view counts

patricia.quote: OSF is a game changer for those wanting to effectively share their research process in the spirit of collaboration.
patricia.facility: Research Services Librarian | University of Toronto

maya.quote: OSF is indispensable in helping me create reproducible research pipelines from preregistration through data collection and analysis. Its versatility makes it my one-stop shop for projects. The Dropbox integration effortlessly transforms my existing local workflow to public repository.

philip.quote: Because SocArXiv is a not-for-profit organization, researchers can be assured that they are sharing their research in an environment where access, inclusivity, and preservation, rather than profit, will remain at the heart of the mission. A great benefit of partnering with OSF is that this application is a free public good.

integrations.title: OSF integrations make your workflow more efficient

metadata.citationInputPlaceholder: Select citation style or start typing
metadata.affiliatedInstitutionsDescription: This is a service provided by the OSF and is automatically applied to your registration. If you are not sure if your institution has signed up for this service, you can look for their name in this list.

makePublic.message:
Please review your projects, components, and add-ons for sensitive or restricted information before making them public.

Once they are made public, you should assume they will always be public. You can return them to private later, but search engines (including Google's cache) or others may access files, wiki pages, or analytics before you do.

makePrivate.message:
• • Public duplicates and registrations of this project will remain public.
  • • Search engines (including Google's cache) or others may have accessed files, wiki pages, or analytics while this project was public.
  • • The project will automatically be removed from any collections. Any pending requests will be cancelled.

tooltipDialog.mainContent: The resource information section allows you to describe what kind of material you are sharing in a human and machine readable format. Indexes and search engines can use the resource types to filter results, increasing discoverability for works with completed metadata. For example, indicating that your resource type is “Dataset” will allow your work to be displayed in other indexes and repositories that specialize in data in addition to the OSF.
tooltipDialog.secondaryContent: You can describe the resources within your entire {{ resourceName }}, and you can also describe the resource type of individual files within. Just open one of your files to edit its metadata.
tooltipDialog.endText: More information is available on our

dialog.licenseTextPlaceholder: License text will appear here when you select a license

addMetadata.title: Add community metadata record
addMetadata.cedarInfo: OSF has partnered with CEDAR to provide more ways to annotate your research with domain or community-specific metadata records. If you would like to request the addition of a new metadata template, contact us at support@osf.io.
addMetadata.publishedText: This metadata has a status of 'Published' and is publicly viewable.
addMetadata.notPublishedText: This metadata has a status of 'Draft' and is not publicly viewable. To 'Publish' this metadata please fill in all required fields and resubmit the data.

filesBrowserDialog.title: Using the OSF Files Browser
filesBrowserDialog.seeAllFiles: See All Files in a Provider
filesBrowserDialog.seeAllFilesDescription: All connected storage providers are displayed in the dropdown above the files list. Choose one provider to view contents.
filesBrowserDialog.selectFilesFoldersDescription: Click on a row (outside of the file or folder name). Click on more rows to select multiple files. Select the ellipses on the right side of the row to see more file options.
filesBrowserDialog.openViewFilesDescription: Click a file name to go to view the file in the OSF. Opens file in a new tab. Click on the folder to open the contents in the files list.
filesBrowserDialog.uploadDescription: There are two ways to upload files. Open the storage provider or folder where you intend to upload files; you can then drag files from your desktop into files list area OR click “Upload Files”, and select your files. Note: File names with special characters may cause unexpected behavior with certain addons.
filesBrowserDialog.createFolderDescription: To create a folder to help organize your files, click “Create a Folder”. Note: You can also organize your project content by creating Components.
filesBrowserDialog.renameFolderFileDescription: In the files list, select the file that you want to rename and click the vertical ellipses to open the dropdown. Select “Rename”. Note: Some special characters may cause unexpected behavior with certain addons.
filesBrowserDialog.moveDescription: You can move your files from one part of your project or component to another. Select the files that you want to move, and click the vertical ellipses to open the dropdown, then click “move”. Choose a component, provider, or folder and then click “Move”.
filesBrowserDialog.copyDescription: You can copy your files from one part of your project or component to another. Select the files that you want to copy, and click the vertical ellipses to open the dropdown, click the “Copy” button. Choose a component, provider, or folder and then click “Copy”. Your files will now appear in both the original and chosen locations.
filesBrowserDialog.downloadAllFilesZip: Download All Files As a Zip
filesBrowserDialog.downloadAllFilesZipDescription: Select the storage provider from the left navigation, and then click “Download As Zip” in the top toolbar.
filesBrowserDialog.downloadFolderZipDescription: To download a specific folder as a zip, click the vertical ellipses on the folder’s row to open the dropdown. Click “Download”. Alternatively, open the folder and then click “Download As Zip” in the top toolbar.
filesBrowserDialog.downloadFileDescription: With the file open: Click the vertical ellipses to open the dropdown. Click “Download”. From the file list: Click the vertical ellipses of the file to open the dropdown. Click “Download”.
filesBrowserDialog.moreInfo: For more information please see our

files.emptyState: No files are available at this time.

tooltips.md5: MD5 is an algorithm used to verify data integrity
tooltips.sha2: SHA-2 is a cryptographic hash function designed by the NSA used to verify data integrity.

helpDialog.message: OSF Search provides a powerful discovery tool to help you find data, papers, analysis plans, and more content across the research lifecycle. OSF Collections have some specialized filters, which you can learn more about on our

addToCollection.projectMetadataMessage: Updates made in this section will update the project.
addToCollection.tooltipMessage: Complete previous step to edit this section
addToCollection.contributorsTooltip: Projects must have at least one registered administrator and one author showing in the citation at all times. A registered administrator is a user who has both confirmed their account and has administrator privileges.
addToCollection.confirmationDialogMessage: Once submitted to the collection, the project will be made public. It can later be made private again. A moderator will review your submission before it is included in the collection.
addToCollection.confirmationDialogToastMessage: Project has been successfully submitted to the collection

moderation.settingsMessage: To configure your notification preferences visit your
moderation.bulkUploadMessage: Drag and drop the csv file that has the registration information to upload.

removeDialog.title: Remove moderator
removeDialog.message: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} moderator?

makeDecision.forceWithdrawMessage: Registration will be withdrawn but still have a tombstone page with a justification for withdrawal and a subset of the metadata available
makeDecision.acceptRequestMessage: Submission will appear in search results and will be associated with the collection.
makeDecision.rejectRequestMessage: Submission will not appear in search results nor will be associated with the collection.
makeDecision.acceptUpdateMessage: Update will be accepted and registration will be updated
makeDecision.rejectUpdateMessage: Update will be rejected and registration will remain unchanged
makeDecision.acceptWithdrawalMessage: Registration will be withdrawn but still have a tombstone page with a justification for withdrawal and subset of the metadata available.
makeDecision.withdrawRequestMessage: Submission will be withdrawn from the collection and will no longer appear in search results.
makeDecision.forceWithdrawSuccess: Submission has been force withdrawn successfully

preprintSettings.warning: Notice: Moderation settings can only be  changed by an OSF administrator. Contact

moderationType.title: Moderation Type
moderationType.preDescription: All preprints are placed in a queue for a moderator to accept or reject. Preprints are displayed publicly only after approval.
moderationType.postDescription: All preprints are displayed publicly immediately upon submission. Preprints also appear in a queue for a moderator to accept or reject. If rejected, the preprint is no longer displayed publicly.

commentVisibility.title: Comment Visibility
commentVisibility.description: Moderators can add comments when making a decision about a submission.
commentVisibility.moderatorsDescription: Comments will be visible to Open Science Framework. Moderators NOT contributors on the submission.
commentVisibility.moderatorsAndContributorsDescription: Comments will be visible to Open Science Framework moderators AND contributors on the submission.

moderatorComments.title: Moderator Comments
moderatorComments.description: If moderators' comments are visible to contributors, the moderator's name can be displayed or hidden from the contributors.
moderatorComments.anonymizedDescription: All comments will be visible to the contributors of the submission, but the moderator's name will not be displayed.
moderatorComments.namedDescription: All comments will be visible to the contributors of the submission and the moderator's osf profile name will be displayed.

moderation.registryEmbargoedWithEndDate: Embargoed Registration with an end date of

list.description: Third-party web applications can connect to the OSF on behalf of users via the OAuth 2.0 web application flow.

navigation.back: Back to list of developer apps

clientId.title: Client ID
clientId.description: The client ID is the developer app's unique identifier and is safe to share publicly.

clientSecret.title: Client Secret
clientSecret.description: The client secret is available only to you. Keep it private and do not share it.

delete.title: Delete App {{name}}?
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this developer app? All users' access tokens will be revoked. This cannot be reversed.

resetSecret.title: Reset Client Secret?
resetSecret.message:
Resetting the client secret will render your application unusable until it is updated with the new client secret, and all users must reauthorize access. Previously issued access tokens will no longer work.

Are you sure you want to reset the client secret? This cannot be reversed.

list.description: Personal access tokens function like ordinary OAuth access tokens. They can be used to authenticate to the API.

scopes.title: Scopes
scopes.description: Scopes limit access for personal access tokens.

navigation.back: Back to list of personal tokens

delete.title: Delete Token {{name}}?
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this token? This action cannot be reversed.

createdDialog.title: Token Successfully Created
createdDialog.warningMessage: This token will never expire. This token should never be shared with others. If it is accidentally revealed publicly, it should be deactivated immediately.
createdDialog.tokenWarning: This is the only time your token will be displayed.

general.title: Open Science Framework General
general.description: Receive general notifications about the OSF every 2-3 weeks.

help.title: Open Science Framework Help
help.description: Receive helpful tips on how to make the most of the OSF, up to once per week.

notificationPreferences.title: Configure Notification Preferences
notificationPreferences.note: Note: Transactional and administrative service emails will still be sent.
notificationPreferences.tooltipText: These are default settings for new projects you create or are added to. Modifying these settings will not modify settings on existing projects.

addons.description: Sync your projects with external services to help stay connected and organized. Select a category from the dropdown and browse the options.
addons.connectedDescription: Manage your connected Add-ons, re-authorize, disconnect account, or disconnect project

google-file-picker.file-folder-title: Select a file or folder to add

configureAddon.title: Configure Add-on
configureAddon.resourceTypeModalMessage:
This helps others understand what kind of material you're sharing. Choosing the right resource type makes it easier for search engines and research tools to find and share your work—both on OSF and in other scholarly indexes.

For example, selecting “Dataset” tells tools and repositories that your files are research data, which helps your work appear in places that specialize in datasets.

Pick the option that best describes most of the files you're linking.

OSF uses resource types from DataCite, a standard used by many research platforms. (Learn more)
configureAddon.disconnectMessage: You are about to disconnect the following addon from the project:

connectAddon.title: Connect Add-on
connectAddon.termsDescription: • This add-on connects your OSF project to an external service. Use of this service is bound by its terms and conditions. The OSF is not responsible for the service or for your use thereof.
connectAddon.storageDescription: • This add-on allows you to store files using an external service. Files added to this add-on are not stored within the OSF.
connectAddon.loginToOrSelectAccount: Login to {{addonName}} or select an account
connectAddon.oauthDescription: Complete the OAuth process in the new window before returning to this page. If you do not see a new window, please click the Start OAuth link below.

fields.hostUrlDescription: Please include the protocol (http:// or https://) in the URL.
fields.accountNameDescription: This will distinguish your account from other using the same addon.

deleteConfirmation.title: Disable Account?
deleteConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to disable this account? All projects connected to this account will be affected.

profileSettings.title: Profile Settings

name.description: Your full name is the name that will be displayed in your profile. To control the way your name will appear in citations, you can edit the fields directly below.

profileSettings.endDateError: End date must be greater than start date.

deactivateAccount.title: Deactivate Account

warning.title: Warning: This action cannot be undone once approved.
warning.confirm: Are you sure you want to request account deactivation?
warning.description: An OSF administrator will review your request. If accepted, you will NOT be able to reactivate your account.

description.main: Deactivating your account will remove you from all public projects to which you are a contributor. Your account will no longer be associated with OSF projects, and your work on the OSF will be inaccessible.
description.secondary: If this is a secondary account that you want to close, consider merging your accounts

deactivateAccount.pendingDeactivation: Your account is currently pending deactivation.

undo.title: Undo deactivation request?
undo.message: Are you sure you want to undo your account deactivation request? This will preserve your account status.

deactivateAccount.successDeactivation: An OSF administrator will contact you shortly to confirm your deactivation request.

affiliatedInstitutions.title: Affiliated Institutions
affiliatedInstitutions.description: Connect your account to institutions to access institutional features and services.

deleteDialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}} institution?

addEmail.title: Add alternative email
addEmail.description: Add an alternative email address to your account.

validation.sameAsOldPassword: New password must be different from old password

messages.error: Failed to update password. Please try again.

connectedEmails.title: Connected Emails
connectedEmails.description: To merge an existing account with this one or to log in with multiple email addresses, add an alternate email address below. All projects and components will be displayed under the email address listed as primary.

deleteDialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}} email?

confirmationSentDialog.message: Your account now includes {{email}}. A confirmation email has been sent to that address. Click the link in the email to confirm this action.

resendDialog.message: Are you sure you want to resend email confirmation to {{email}}?

makePrimaryDialog.message: Are you sure you want to make {{email}} email primary?

connectedIdentities.title: Connected identities
connectedIdentities.description: Connected identities allow you to log in to the OSF via a third-party service. You can revoke these identifies.
connectedIdentities.noIdentities: You have not authorized any external services to log in to the OSF.

deleteDialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}} identity?

defaultStorageLocation.title: Default storage location
defaultStorageLocation.description: This location will be applied to new projects and components. It will not affect existing projects and components.

shareIndexing.title: Opt out of SHARE indexing
shareIndexing.description: By default, OSF users are indexed into SHARE, a free, open dataset of research metadata. This allows SHARE to include your user profile and research in its database, which is used by search engines and other services to make research more discoverable. You can opt out of this indexing by checking the box below. NOTE: Public projects, files, registrations, and preprints will still be indexed in SHARE.

description.enabled: By using two-factor authentication, you will protect your OSF account with both your password and your mobile phone.
description.warning: Important: If you lose access to your mobile device, you will not be able to log in to your OSF account.
description.setup: To use, you must install an appropriate application on your mobile device. Google Authenticator is a popular choice and is available for both Android and iOS.
description.verification: Once verified, your device will display a six-digit code that must be entered during the login process. This code changes every few seconds, which means that unauthorized users will not be able to log in to you account, even if they know your password.
description.scan:
Scan the image below, or enter the secret key

{{secret}}

into your authentication device.
description.disabled: Two-factor authentication protects your OSF account using both your password and email.

verification.label: Enter your verification code:
verification.error: Verification code is invalid. Please try again.

configure.title: Configure
configure.description: Configuring two-factor authentication will not immediately activate this feature for your account. You will need to follow the steps that appear below to complete the activation of two-factor authentication for your account.

disable.title: Disable
disable.message: Are you sure you want to disable two-factor authentication?

landing.title: Meetings
landing.description: A free poster and presentation sharing service for academic meetings and conferences
landing.submissionsNote: Only conferences with at least five submissions are displayed.

discover.title: Discover
discover.description: Explore posters and presentations from events long after they're over.

share.title: Share
share.description: Get persistent links to your content and increase your impact.

enhance.title: Enhance
enhance.description: Add supplementary data and materials to your submission to make your work more transparent.

preprints.title: Preprints

services.title: Preprint Services
services.description: Leading preprint service providers use this open source infrastructure to support their communities.

createServer.title: Create your own branded preprint servers backed by the OSF

helpDialog.message: OSF Search provides a powerful discovery tool to help you find data, papers, analysis plans, and more content across the research lifecycle. OSF Preprints has some specialized filters, which you can learn more about on our

selectService.title: Add A Preprint
selectService.description: A preprint is a version of a scholarly or scientific paper that is posted online before it has undergone formal peer review and published in a scientific journal.

titleAndAbstract.title: Title and Abstract
titleAndAbstract.abstractMinLengthError: Abstract must be at least {{length}} characters.

file.title: File
file.note: Note: You cannot switch options once a file is attached.

projectSelection.title: Project Title
projectSelection.description: This will make your project public, if it is not already
projectSelection.subDescription: The projects and components for which you have admin access are listed below.

versionFile.message: This will allow a new version of the preprint file to be uploaded to the preprint. The existing file will be retained as a version of the preprint.

tooltips.computerDisabled: Start a new preprint to attach a file from your computer.
tooltips.projectDisabled: Start a new preprint to attach a file from your project.

metadata.title: Metadata

publicationDoi.title: Publication DOI (optional)
publicationDoi.patternError: Please use a valid DOI format (10.xxxx/xxxxx)

metadata.affiliatedInstitutionsDescription: You can affiliate your {{preprintWord}} with your institution if it is an OSF institutional member and has worked with the Center for Open Science to create a dedicated institutional OSF landing page.

conflictOfInterest.title: Conflict of Interest
conflictOfInterest.description: The Conflict of Interest (COI) assertion is made on behalf of all the authors listed for this preprint. COIs include: financial involvement in any entity such as honoraria, grants, speaking fees, employment, consultancies, stock ownership, expert testimony, and patents or licenses. COIs can also include non-financial interests such as personal or professional relationships or pre-existing beliefs in the subject matter or materials discussed in this preprint.
conflictOfInterest.noCoiPlaceholder: Author asserted there is no Conflict of Interest with this preprint.

publicData.title: Public Data
publicData.description: Data refers to raw and/or processed information (quantitative or qualitative) used for the analyses, case studies, and/or descriptive interpretation in the preprint. Public data could include data posted to open-access repositories, public archival library collection, or government archive. For data that is available under limited circumstances (e.g., after signing a data sharing agreement), choose the 'No' option and use the comment box to explain how others could access the data.
publicData.notApplicablePlaceholder: Author asserted there is no data associated with this preprint.

publicPreregistration.title: Public Preregistration
publicPreregistration.description: A preregistration is a description of the research design and/or analysis plan that is created and registered before researchers collected data or before they have seen/interacted with preexisting data. The description should appear in a public registry (e.g., clinicaltrials.gov, OSF, AEA registry).
publicPreregistration.notApplicablePlaceholder: The author asserts that a preregistration is not applicable because no data collection, extraction, or analysis is reported in the preprint.

supplements.title: Supplements (optional)
supplements.description: Connect an OSF project to share data, code, protocols, or other supplemental materials.

projectSelection.title: Select Project
projectSelection.description: This will make your project public, if it is not already
projectSelection.subDescription: The projects and components for which you have admin access are listed below.

disconnectProject.message: This will disconnect the selected project. You can select new supplemental material or re-add the same supplemental material at a later date.

discardChanges.message: You have unsaved changes in the project creation form. Are you sure you want to go back?

review.title: Consent to publish
review.consentDescription: By submitting this preprint you confirm that all contributors agree with sharing it and that you have the right to share this preprint.
review.workflowDescription: {{providerName}} uses {{reviewsWorkflow}}. If your preprint is accepted, it will be assigned a DOI and become publicly accessible via OSF. The preprint file cannot be deleted but it can be updated or modified.

authorAssertions.title: Author Assertions
authorAssertions.noCoi: Author asserted no Conflict of Interest.
authorAssertions.noData: Author asserted there is no data associated with this preprint.
authorAssertions.noPrereg: The author asserts that a preregistration is not applicable because no data collection, extraction, or analysis is reported in the preprint.

supplements.title: Supplements (Optional)
supplements.noSupplements: Author did not add any supplements for this preprint

myPreprints.title: My Preprints
myPreprints.searchPlaceholder: Filter by title, description, and tags

doi.title: {{documentType}} DOI
doi.pendingDoiMinted: DOIs are minted by a third party, and may take up to 24 hours to be registered.
doi.pendingDoi: DOI created after {{documentType}} is made public

messages.pendingPreModeration: is not publicly available or searchable until approved by a moderator.
messages.pendingPostModeration: is publicly available and searchable but is subject to removal by a moderator.
messages.accepted: has been accepted by a moderator and is publicly available and searchable.
messages.rejected: has been rejected by a moderator and is not publicly available or searchable.
messages.pendingWithdrawal: This {{documentType}} has been requested by the authors to be withdrawn. It will still be publicly searchable until the request has been approved.
messages.withdrawalRejected: Your request to withdraw this {{documentType}} from the service has been denied by the moderator.

details.warningBanner: OSF preprints are not peer reviewed and acceptance into OSF preprints is not an indicator of scholarly merit.

withdrawDialog.title: Withdraw {{preprintWord}}
withdrawDialog.withdrawalExplanation: You are about to withdraw this version of your {{singularPreprintWord}}. Withdrawing a version will remove it from public view but will not affect other versions of this {{singularPreprintWord}}, if available.
withdrawDialog.justificationInputError: Comment must be at least {{length}} characters.
withdrawDialog.preModerationNoticePending: Since this version is still pending approval and private, it can be withdrawn immediately. The reason of withdrawal will be visible to service moderators. Once withdrawn, the {{singularPreprintWord}} will remain private and never be made public.
withdrawDialog.preModerationNoticeAccepted:
{{pluralCapitalizedPreprintWord}} are a permanent part of the scholarly record. Withdrawal requests are subject to this service’s policy on {{singularPreprintWord}} version removal and at the discretion of the moderators.
This service uses pre-moderation. This request will be submitted to service moderators for review. If the request is approved, this {{singularPreprintWord}} version will be replaced by a tombstone page with metadata and the reason for withdrawal. This {{singularPreprintWord}} version will still be searchable by other users after removal.
withdrawDialog.postModerationNotice:
{{pluralCapitalizedPreprintWord}} are a permanent part of the scholarly record. Withdrawal requests are subject to this service’s policy on {{singularPreprintWord}} version removal and at the discretion of the moderators.
This service uses post-moderation. This request will be submitted to service moderators for review. If the request is approved, this {{singularPreprintWord}} version will be replaced by a tombstone page with metadata and the reason for withdrawal. This {{singularPreprintWord}} version will still be searchable by other users after removal.
withdrawDialog.noModerationNotice:
{{pluralCapitalizedPreprintWord}} are a permanent part of the scholarly record. Withdrawal requests are subject to this service’s policy on {{singularPreprintWord}} version removal and at the discretion of the moderators.
This request will be submitted to {{supportEmail}} for review and removal. If the request is approved, this {{singularPreprintWord}} version will be replaced by a tombstone page with metadata and the reason for withdrawal. This {{singularPreprintWord}} version will still be searchable by other users after removal.

comments.private: Comments are not visible to contributors
comments.public: Comments are visible to contributors on decision

names.named: Commenter's name is visible to contributors

moderation.pre: Submission appears in search results once accepted
moderation.post: Submission will be removed from search results and made private if rejected

accept.label: Accept submission
accept.pre: Submission will appear in search results and be made public.
accept.post: Submission will continue to appear in search results.

reject.label: Reject submission
reject.pre: Submission will not appear in search results and will remain private.
reject.post: Submission will be removed from search results and made private.

approve.label: Approve withdrawal
approve.explanation: Submission will be withdrawn but still have a tombstone page with a subset of the metadata available

withdrawn.label: Withdraw submission
withdrawn.post: Submission will no longer be publicly available.

decision.commentPlaceholder: Explain the reasoning behind your decision
decision.commentLengthError: Comment is {{length}} character(s) too long (maximum is {{limit}}).
decision.withdrawalJustification: Reason for withdrawal (optional, will be publicly displayed)
decision.denialJustification: Reason for denial (required, not publicly visible)
decision.justificationRequiredError: Request decision justification can't be blank
decision.justificationLengthError: Request decision justification is too short (minimum is {{minLength}} characters)

preprints.preprintContributorsWarning: Warning: Changing your permissions will prevent you from editing your draft.

registries.title: Registries
registries.noRegistrations: You don't have any registrations. Create one with the button below.

services.title: Registry Services
services.description: Leading registry service providers use this open source infrastructure to support their communities.

new.infoText1: You are submitting to OSF Registries.
new.infoText2: to learn more about other hosted registries.

steps.title: Step
steps.step1: Do you have content for registration in an existing OSF project?
steps.step2: Which project do you want to register?
steps.step3: Which type of registration would you like to create?
steps.step2InfoText: If your project includes components, you can select which components to include or exclude at the end of the registration.

registries.confirmDeleteDraft: Are you sure you want to delete this draft registration?

metadata.title: Registration  Metadata
metadata.description: This metadata applies only to the registration you are creating, and will not be applied to your project.

selectComponents.title: Select Components
selectComponents.description: Contributor changes for included components must be done on the component contributor page before submitting this registration.

confirmation.title: Almost done...
confirmation.text1: Embargo your registration if you plan to submit to a journal that requires
confirmation.text3: Do not edit any files until the registration archives.
confirmation.text4: Registrations can't be deleted, but you can withdraw.

justification.title: Justification for update
justification.description: Justification will be provided to admins and moderators upon review. Once approved, it will be displayed at the top of the registration.
justification.placeholder: Explain the updates made to this registration and why the changes were necessary. Be thorough in your response.

confirmDeleteUpdate.message: Are you sure you want to delete this draft update?

confirmContinueEditing.header: Are you sure this needs more edits?
confirmContinueEditing.message: This will cancel any approvals from other admin contributors and return the registration back to its draft form for additional changes.
confirmContinueEditing.label: What additional changes need to be made and why?

justification.caution: Caution: Only one person is able to edit a registration draft at a time. Be sure to coordinate with any other contributors.

overview.withdrawDescription: Withdrawing a registration will remove its content from the OSF, but leave basic metadata behind. The title of a withdrawn registration and its contributor list will remain, as will justification or explanation of the withdrawal, should you wish to provide it. Withdrawn registrations will be marked with a "withdrawn" tag. This action is irreversible.
overview.withdrawJustificationLabel: Please provide your justification for withdrawing this registration.
overview.endEmbargoMessage: By clicking confirm, an email will be sent to project administrator(s) to approve ending the embargo. If approved, this registration, including any components, will be made public immediately. This action is irreversible.

pendingRegistrationApproval.long: This registration is waiting for approval from its contributors.

pendingEmbargoApproval.long: This registration is waiting for approval from its contributors. Once approved, the registration will remain private until the embargo ends.

pending.long: This registration is awaiting a decision by the registry moderators. An email will notify all registration contributors of the decision.

accepted.long: This public registration is a frozen, non-editable version of this

embargo.long: This registration is embargoed. It will remain private until {{embargoEndDate}}.

pendingEmbargoTermination.long: This registration is waiting for approval from its contributors to terminate its embargo and be made public.

pendingWithdrawRequest.long: This registration is waiting for approval to be withdrawn by its contributors.

pendingWithdraw.long: This registration is waiting for approval to be withdrawn by registry moderators.

inProgress.long: This registration is currently being updated by its contributors. Updates will be made available once approved.

pendingModeration.long: This registration has an update that is waiting for moderation. Updates will be made available once approved.

updatePendingApproval.long: This registration has an update that is waiting for approval from its contributors. Updates will be made available once approved.

initialApproved.long: This registration is awaiting approval by all admin contributors or after 48 hours has passed. An email will notify all registration contributors of the decision. If the registration is pending after 48 hours has passed, contact support at {{email}}.

overview.updatedRevisionDescription: This is an update to the original registration. This update was made on

links.viewLinksProjectsAndComponents: View for Linked projects and Components
links.noLinkedProjectsOrComponentsFound: No linked projects or components found

archiving.title: This registration is currently archiving, and no changes can be made at this time.
archiving.description: Changes to any files (1) in the projects or components being registered, (2) uploaded or selected as prompt responses, including those connected through add-ons during archiving will result in archiving failure and loss of your registration timestamp. Please do not modify your files until after you have received email confirmation of archiving completion. If this registration has been archiving for more than 72 hours, please email

withdrawn.title: This registration has been withdrawn for the reason(s) stated below.

title.description: Provide a concise and descriptive title for your registration that accurately reflects the main focus of your research. A clear and specific title will help others quickly understand the essence of your study.

description.message: Write a detailed description of your research project, including its purpose and any expected outcomes. This should give readers a comprehensive overview of your work.

affiliatedInstitutions.description: This is a service provided by the OSF and is automatically applied to your registration. If you are not sure if your institution has signed up for this service, you can look for their name in this list.

license.title: License
license.description: A license tells others how they can use your work in the future and only applies to the information and files submitted with the registration.

subjects.title: Subjects
subjects.description: Identify the main subject areas that your research pertains to. This helps categorize your work and makes it easier for others in your field to find and reference it.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Enter specific keywords that describe the key elements and concepts of your research. These keywords will improve the discoverability of your registration in search results and databases.

files.limitText: You may attach up to 5 file(s) to this question. Files cannot total over 5GB in size.
files.description: Uploaded files will automatically be archived in this registration. They will also be added to a related project that will be created for this registration.

labels.noCoi: Author asserted no Conflict of Interest

pageNotFound.title: Page not found
pageNotFound.message: The page you were looking for is either doesn't exist, was deleted, or the URL may be incorrect. If this should not have occurred and the issue persists, please report it to

forbiddenPage.title: You Don't Have Permission To Perform This Action
forbiddenPage.message: If this should not have occurred and the issue persists, please report it to

requestAccess.title: You Need Permission
requestAccess.message: Ask for access, or switch to an account with permission.
requestAccess.helpMessage: If this should not have occurred, please contact
requestAccess.requestedSuccessMessage: Your request for access has been sent.

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address.
validation.maxLength: The field must be at most {{length}} characters.
validation.minLength: The field must be at least {{length}} characters.
validation.link: This field must start with https:// to be a valid url.

step1.title: Improved OSF Search
step1.description: Enter any term in the search box and filter by specific object types. More information is available on our help guides.

step2.title: Refine Your Search
step2.description: Narrow the source, discipline, and more. For example, find content supported by a specific funder or view only datasets.

step3.title: Add Metadata
step3.description: Remember to add metadata and resources to your own work on OSF to make it more discoverable! Learn more in our help guides.

institutions.title: Institutions
institutions.description:
OSF Institutions enhances transparency and increases the visibility of research outputs, accelerating discovery and reuse. Institutional members focus on generating and sharing research, and let OSF Institutions handle the infrastructure.
Read more
institutions.searchInstitutionsDesctiption: Please select an institution to apply to your search. Only OSF Institutions member affiliations are discoverable.

contact.message: I am an admin associated with Center For Open Science and I would like to be added to your project as a non-bibliographic contributor in order to assist with metadata curation please add me with the following permissions.

institutionUsers.writeEmailText: Please write the text of your email here

requestAccessErrorDialog.title: Can't Request Access
requestAccessErrorDialog.detailsMessage: The user has the request access feature turned off, or you already have access. Reach out to the user by sending an email message by pressing the "Back" button below.

resources.title: Resources
resources.linkDoi: Link a DOI from a repository to your registration by clicking “Add resource” button.
resources.description: Contributors affirmed to adhere to the criteria for each badge.
resources.deleteText: Are you sure you want to delete resource? This cannot be undone.

toastMessages.addResourceError: Error occurred while adding new resource.
toastMessages.updateResourceError: Error occurred while updating new resource.

errors.doiValidation: Please enter a valid DOI in the format: 10.xxxx/xxxxx

activities.coi_statement_updated: {{user}} changed the conflict of interest statement for {{preprint}}.
activities.external_registration_created: A registration of {{node}} was created on an external registry.
activities.external_registration_imported: A registration of {{node}} was imported to OSF from an external registry.
activities.file_tag_added: {{user}} added tag {{tag}} to {{path}} in OSF Storage in {{node}}
activities.file_tag_removed: {{user}} removed tag {{tag}} from {{path}} in OSF Storage in {{node}}
activities.has_coi_updated: {{user}} changed the conflict of interest statement availability for {{preprint}}.
activities.has_data_links_updated: {{user}} has updated the has links to data field to {{value}}
activities.has_prereg_links_updated: {{user}} has updated their preregistration data link availability to {{value}}
activities.made_contributor_invisible: {{user}} made bibliographic contributor {{contributors}} a non-bibliographic contributor on {{node}}
activities.made_contributor_visible: {{user}} made non-bibliographic contributor {{contributors}} a bibliographic contributor on {{node}}
activities.made_wiki_private: {{user}} made the wiki of {{node}} privately editable
activities.made_wiki_public: {{user}} made the wiki of {{node}} publicly editable
activities.osf_storage_file_added: {{user}} added file {{path}} to OSF Storage in {{node}}
activities.osf_storage_file_updated: {{user}} updated file {{path}} in OSF Storage in {{node}}
activities.osf_storage_folder_created: {{user}} created folder {{path}} in OSF Storage in {{node}}
activities.preprint_file_updated: {{user}} updated the primary file of this {{preprint}} on {{preprintProvider}} {{preprintWordPlural}}
activities.preprint_license_updated: {{user}} updated the license of this {{preprint}} on {{preprintProvider}} {{preprintWordPlural}} to {{license}}
activities.prereg_links_info_updated: {{user}} has updated their preregistration links to {{value}}
activities.prereg_links_updated: {{user}} has updated their preregistration data links
activities.prereg_registration_initiated: {{user}} submitted for review to the Preregistration Challenge a registration of {{node}}
activities.project_created_from_draft_reg: {{node}} was created from a draft registration
activities.resource_identifier_added: {{user}} has added a Resource to Registration {{node}}
activities.resource_identifier_removed: {{user}} has removed a Resource to Registration {{node}}
activities.resource_identifier_updated: {{user}} has updated a Resource to Registration {{node}}
activities.retraction_approved: {{user}} approved a withdrawal of a registration of {{node}}
activities.retraction_approved_no_user: A withdrawal of a registration of {{node}} was approved
activities.retraction_cancelled: {{user}} cancelled withdrawal of a registration of {{node}}
activities.retraction_initiated: {{user}} initiated withdrawal of a registration of {{node}}
activities.retraction_initiated_no_user: A withdrawal of a registration of {{node}} was proposed
activities.why_no_prereg_updated: {{user}} has updated their preregistration data availability statement
activities.wiki_updated: {{user}} updated wiki page {{page}} to version {{version}} of {{node}}
